name: @olton/dom
title: Dom
description: DOM - Work with HTML elements, animation HTML elements and props, and ajax routines. JQuery replacer.

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 NODE_ENV=production node build.js
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 NODE_ENV=development node build.js
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm publish --access public
